Title: Santa Company
Description:
['As a trainee of Santa Company, Noel White prepares for her test to become an official Tonttu, her assignment being "To find the most important thing for a Santa Claus."', '
', '
', '
', '
The deadline nears with an answer yet to be found, when a single letter from a child arrives late at the company. As the letter is about to be handled as a defect, Noel and friends set out on an adventure for the present - but will Noel find the answer to her assignment?', '
', '
', '
', '
Set a year after the events of the novel.']
Characters: ['Rondo, Mint', 'Dou, Thomas', 'Crystal, Bell', 'White, Noel', 'Rudolph III', 'Santa Claus', 'Nazo no Tenshu', 'White, Nicola', 'Rondo, Pedro']
Voices: ['Tomatsu, Haruka', 'Kugimiya, Rie', 'Kaji, Yuki', 'Fujimura, Ayumi', 'Karasuma, Yuichi', 'Kitada, Masamichi', 'Inaba, Minoru', 'Touchi, Hiroki', 'Sakurai, Takahiro']
Staff: [['Itoso, Kenji', 'Producer, Director, Script, Theme Song Lyrics, Planning, Series Composition'], ['Kamakura, Yumi', 'Director'], ['Mima, Masafumi', 'Sound Director'], ['Fukushima, Naohiro', 'Script, Series Composition']]
